title: Amumu Patch 5.5 Bug
body:
Came acorss the bug earlier. Even with no mana Amumu's W stays on infinitely even though you're out of mana.

Not sure if it's been brought to attention but I thought I'd post it anyway.

http://puu.sh/gDQ3n/3fbb04f486.png

replies.body:
>not using the in built image uploader

Here's the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
